name: Trial of Colors (Am0sS)
description:
Trial of Colors was developed throughout a month as a final project for a course called "Buutti Game Dev Academy". 
The game was developed by 3 members;
Janne Mäntysaari
Petri Helala
&
Dániel Ördög



Controls and Mechanics
Controls and Game Mechanics are explained in the game by clicking on the "How To Play" button in the Main Menu, make sure to read it through.
Press "Escape" to go back to the main menu at any time.
NOTE: This will restart your game completely.
